```{=html}
<!-- NOTE: Forms will be populated by JS -->
<div id="api-params" class="overlay overlay-blur">
  <div class="overlay-content">
  </div>
</div>
  <div
    id="quarto-controls"
    class="quarto-controls btn-group py-3"
    role="group"
  >
    <button
      type="button"
      class="btn"
    >
      <i class="bi bi-journal-code"></i>
      <text>Quarto</text>
    </button>
    <button
      id="quarto-controls-render"
      type="button"
      data-key="render"
      class="btn btn-outline-warning"
      data-bs-toggle="tooltip"
      data-bs-placement="top"
      title="Render"
    >
      <i class="bi bi-hammer"></i>
    </button>
    <button
      id="quarto-controls-get-last"
      type="button"
      data-key="get-last"
      class="btn btn-outline-success"
      data-bs-toggle="tooltip"
      data-bs-placement="top"
      title="Last Rendered"
    >
      <i class="bi bi-clock"></i>
    </button>
    <button
      id="quarto-controls-get-all"
      type="button"
      data-key="get-all"
      class="btn btn-outline-success"
      data-bs-toggle="tooltip"
      data-bs-placement="top"
      title="Render History"
    >
      <i class="bi bi-clock-history"></i>
    </button>
    <button
      id="quarto-controls-clear-renders"
      type="button"
      class="btn btn-outline-danger"
      data-bs-toggle="tooltip"
      data-bs-placement="top"
      title="Clear Renders"
    >
      <i class="bi bi-trash"></i>
    </button>
  </div>

  <div
    id="server-controls"
    class="server-controls btn-group"
    role="group"
  >
    <button
      type="button"
      class="btn"
    >
      <i class="bi bi-server"></i>
      <text>Server</text>
    </button>
    <button
      id="server-controls-clear-logs"
      type="button"
      class="btn btn-outline-danger"
      data-bs-toggle="tooltip"
      data-bs-placement="top"
      title="Clear Logs"
    >
      <i class="bi bi-trash"></i>
    </button>
  </div>
```

```{=html}
<script type="module">
  document.getElementById("title-block-header").remove()
  document.getElementById("quarto-document-content").classList.add("px-1")

  globalThis.serverLog = ServerLog({
    last: 32,
    serverLogContainer: document.querySelector("#live-logs-server tbody"),
    serverLogParent: document.querySelector("#tab-content-1"),
  })

  globalThis.quarto = Quarto({
    last: 32,
    filters: {},
    quartoOverlayControls: Overlay(document.getElementById("quarto-overlay")),
    quartoLogs: document.querySelector("#quarto-live-logs tbody"),
    quartoLogsParent: document.querySelector("#tab-content-2"),
    quartoOverlayContent: document.querySelector('#quarto-overlay-content'),
  })

  const quartoContent = document.getElementById("quarto-content")
  quartoContent.classList.remove("page-columns")

  globalThis.quartoControls = QuartoControls()

</script>
```
